hints.content:
We start at $11{:}34$ when Blanca finishes her bike ride. 

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 with tick marks  every 1 unit. A point is marked at 11:34. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **left** on the number line $40$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{11{:}34} -{} &\greenD{4}\text{ minutes} = 11{:}30\\\\
11{:}30 -{} & \purpleD{30}\text{ minutes} = 11{:}00 \\\\
11{:}00 -{}&\goldE{6}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{10{:}54}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 11:34 tick mark to the 10:54 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 11:34  tick mark and ends at the 11:30  tick mark and is labeled minus 4. The second arrow starts at the 11:30 tick mark and ends at the 11:00 tick mark and is labeled minus 30. The third arrow starts at the 11:00 tick mark and ends at the 10:54 tick mark and is labeled minus 6. !

hints.content:
Blanca starts her bike ride at $10{:}54\text{ a.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 10:54. !

question.content:
Blanca  finishes riding her bike at  $11{:}34\text{ a.m.}$ She rides her bike for $40$ minutes.

**Which number line below shows when Blanca starts her bike ride?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 10:49.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1798d4b49aac3e17dd98d72d8db788c95ae409fc)
![A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 11:40.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a51df93ce2c85e564e73587af9f89858d316f8d2)
![A number line labeled 10:45 to 11:45 tick marks  every 1 unit. A point is marked at 10:54.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/71cd0d1dcba6deffc5e0fd9ae4c1785230d2c29c)
